Hello,

Are you using maven?

If so, one option that you could possibly con=
sider is using a different
provider to surefire.

A provider is a class whi=
ch knows how to run a set of tests. There is a
provider for JUnit3, JUnit p=
re 4.7 and JUnit post 4.7. JUnit post 4.7 uses
the JUnitCore, which you cou=
ld replace with your own version, which inserts
the same rule everywhere.

=
It seems (at first glance) to be a better way to get global behaviour from
=
your jenkins server.

Matthew Farwell.

 create suites without having to specify all classes in it

eading this direction anyway but I get the feeling its a
> little too much =
for this concern.

em as its highly

nt you think so?
